sentences.sentence: They were knocked to the ground, beaten senseless and robbed of their wallets.
sentences.translation: 他们被打倒在地、不省人事，还被抢走了钱包。

sentences.sentence: Keep wallets, purses and other valuables out of sight.
sentences.translation: 把钱包、皮夹和其他贵重物品放在看不见的地方。

sentences.sentence: Since these messages have an agenda—to lure us to open our wallets—they make the very idea of happiness seem unreliable.
sentences.translation: 由于这些信息有一个目的——引诱我们打开钱包——它们使得幸福这一概念看起来不可靠。
